title: The Ghost and Ms. MacKay
description: A Maggie MacKay Holiday Short Story  It's Halloween and Maggie's mother is throwing a haunted houseâ€¦ as in, she's invited all the ghosts of the neighborhood over for a party. Unfortunately, one of the ghosts is not in high spirits and, in fact, is wanted by the Other Side's finest. It is up to Maggie and Killian to find out what caused this soul's unrest and return him to his happy haunting ground.  This story originally appeared in the Nightshade anthology.  WARNING: This short story contains cussing, brawling, and unladylike behavior. Proceed at your own risk.
author: Kate Danley
